name: zubridge-electron-example-separate-handlers
description: An application demonstrating the use of zubridge-electron with action handlers which are separate from the Zustand store
author: goosewobbler

scripts.clean: pnpm clean:output && pnpm dlx shx rm -rf ./node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run typecheck:node && pnpm run typecheck:web
scripts.build: pnpm run typecheck && electron-vite build && electron-builder
